Great attention is paid to strengthening security in Azerbaijan. There are no potential threats and risks within the country.
Combining efforts of the world community in the fight against terrorism is a key condition for regional and international security.
Having suffered from terrorism, Azerbaijan has always been actively involved in the fight against international terrorism.
Terrorist attacks against Azerbaijan initiated by Armenia in the early 1990s (cont) http://t.co/a2uvxxJBKP
Armenian terrorist organizations have so far committed more than 30 terrorist acts in the territory of Azerbaijan, resulting in 2 (cont) http://t.co/w1ies08RDg
The occupation of Azerbaijani lands by Armenia is a violation of international law and all human norms.
The Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict is a major threat to regional security and stability.
The territorial integrity of Azerbaijan is important and should be restored as the territorial integrity of any country.
